member.name: T:MainClass
member.summary: The main class for testing the VectorMath.CrossProduct method.

member.name: M:MainClass.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:VectorMath
member.summary: This class contains methods for performing operations on vectors.

member.name: M:VectorMath.CrossProduct(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculates the cross product of two 3D vectors.
member.returns: The resulting cross product vector, or a vector filled with -1 if the input vectors are not 3D.
member.exception: Thrown if either input vector is not of dimension 3.
